front.title: Flow Binding in Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This document introduces extensions to Proxy Mobile IPv6 that allowsnetworks dynamically binding IP flows to different interfaces of amobile node. Mobile Access Gateways can move flows to other mobileaccess gateways by establishing flow bindings at the local mobilityanchor. Local mobility anchor sends packets from the offloaded flowseamlessly to the new mobile access gateway.
